name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Steven Neil LIPPMAN.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Steven Neil LIPPMAN.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Steven Neil LIPPMAN.
No. D-2737.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 4, 2013.
Steven Neil Lippman, of Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
